desc.p: Contains the name of the enquiry field, defined in the FIELD.NAME in an enquiry.
Standard T24 alphanumeric field with maximum of 35 characters.
Field FIELD.NAME to FIELD.DETAIL forms a related multivalue set.
No input field.
Contains the format of the FIELD.NAME. I.e., NUMERIC, ALPHANUMERIC,
Standard T24 alphanumeric field with maximum of 35 characters.
Field FIELD.NAME to FIELD.DETAIL forms a related multivalue set.
No input field.
Contains the number of fields being displayed in the enquiry.
Standard T24 numeric field of maximum of 3 characters.
Used to determine in which area of the enquiry the data belongs to. I.e., HEADER, FOOTER, CAPTION,
Standard T24 alphanumeric field of maximum of 35 characters.
Field FIELD.NAME to FIELD.DETAIL forms a related multivalue set.
No input field.
Contains the enquiry's attribute - PAGE or GRID.
Standard T24 alphanumeric field with maximum of 35 characters.
No input field.
Contains the enquiry's ID as @ID
T24 alphanumeric field with maximum of 50 characters.
Contains the operation on the FIELD.NAME, if section of the field is HEADER or CAPTION.
Standard T24 alphanumeric field with maximum of 35 characters.
Field FIELD.NAME to FIELD.DETAIL forms a related multivalue set.
No input field.
Contains the label of the FIELD.NAME if FIELD.LBL is defined in an enquiry, otherwise same as FIELD.NAME.
Standard T24 alphanumeric field with maximum of 20 characters.
Field FIELD.NAME to FIELD.DETAIL forms a related multivalue set.
No input field.
